item.title: Badstore - VulnHub Solution
item.description: New year, new challenge I decided to try VulnHub, it is different from the classic CTF i use to. Where to start? Easy at the beginning, I navigated to the timeline page, scrolled all the way down, found the first released machine, Badstore: 1.2.3, downloaded it, installed it, and letâ€™s get started. Open the other VM with Kali and launch a scan with Nmap (classic), below the command: sudo nmap -sC -sV -oA badstore/nmap_result 192.
